name: BikeRazy!
description:
BikeRazy! is an on-rails 2D platformer with a biker trying to reach the end of a mountain track full of perils such as boulders, pitfalls and alien jelly monsters. The usual stuff.

Humorous and hard like an 8-bit game. You WILL get angry, I promise. Hop on your bike and get crazy!

Developed by Vitor Guerra.
Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo.

Contact me by my e-mail address: Aster_Works@protonmail.com
